import fractions
for t in xrange(int(raw_input())):
	n, q = map(int, raw_input().split())
	a = map(int, raw_input().split())
	
	front = [0]*n
	front[0] = a[0]
	for i in xrange(1,n):
		front[i] = fractions.gcd(a[i], front[i-1])
	
	end = [0]*n
	end[n-1] = a[n-1]
	for i in xrange(n-2, -1, -1):
		end[i] = fractions.gcd(a[i], end[i+1])
	
	for Q in xrange(q):
		l, r = map(int, raw_input().split())
		l=l-1
		r=r-1
		if (r==n-1):
			print front[l-1]
		elif (l==0):
			print end[r+1]
		else:
			print fractions.gcd(front[l-1], end[r+1])
